data.actual_result: Discord doesn't allow you to type more than 32 characters without using another platform
data.expected_result: Discord will allow you to type more than 32 characters without using another platform
data.short_description: Unable to type more than 32 characters for a role name without using another platform
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you can manage roles - Create a new role - Try to make the role name longer than 32 characters - Additionally, if you have desktop, edit the role name to be more than 32 characters - Go back on iOS and try adding more characters to the role name
